Hero.SubTitle: Coordinate with your community to detect website blocks
Share.Twitter.Tweet: Run OONI Probe to test websites for censorship!
Nettest.Heading.HaveMobileApp: Do you have OONI Probe Mobile installed?
Nettest.Text.HaveMobileApp: Click the button below to install the OONI Run link in OONI Probe.
Nettest.Heading.InstallApp: Don’t have the OONI Probe app?
Nettest.Text.InstallApp: Install OONI Probe Mobile from the app store and click on the OONI Run link again.
Notice.Paste: Note: If you have a long list of URLs to add, you can copy and paste them into one of the boxes below.
WhatCanYouDoText.WebCensorship:
Below you can create a link that you can share with your community to test websites for censorship.

To create your link, add URLs below that you would like to test for censorship. To encourage your community to perform testing, customize your link by adding a title and description. When you're done, click the "Create link" button and share the generated link with [OONI Probe mobile app](https://ooni.org/install/mobile) users so that they can test the websites of your choice!
Error.UrlFormat: Please include a valid URL format e.g "https://ooni.org/post/"
Home.About: OONI Run supports community efforts aimed at detecting website blocks. Create an OONI Run link to test the websites of your choice!
Home.Box1.Title: Rapid response
Home.Box1.Description: Does your country have upcoming elections? Censorship events frequently [emerge](https://ooni.org/reports/) around the world during elections, protests, and other political events. If you suspect that certain websites might be blocked during political events, use this platform to create an OONI Run link for their testing. Share that link with [OONI Probe](https://ooni.org/install/mobile) users to collect evidence of blocks!
Home.Box2.Title: Censorship research
Home.Box2.Description: Interested in researching the blocking of specific websites? Use this platform to create an OONI Run link for the testing of the websites you care about. Share that link with [OONI Probe](https://ooni.org/install/mobile) users in different countries! Learn [how community members have used OONI Run as part of their research efforts](https://ooni.org/support/ooni-censorship-measurement-campaigns).
Home.Box3.Title: Monitor your site
Home.Box3.Description: Interested in monitoring the blocking of your website around the world? By having your website tested by [OONI Probe](https://ooni.org/install/) users, you will get [real-time open data](https://ooni.org/data/) which shows how the block is technically implemented and on which networks it's blocked. Use this platform to generate an OONI Run link for the testing of your website!
Home.Button.Login: Log in to create OONI Run link
Nettest.DeprecationWarning:
This version of OONI Run links will be deprecated on 1st January 2025.
To migrate to the latest version (OONI Run v2), <login>login</login> and create new links.

Login.Title: Please log in to continue
Login.EnterEmail:
Add your email address and click the link sent to your email to log in.

When you create an OONI Run link, we will store your email address. This enables OONI Probe users who receive your OONI Run link to trust it.
Login.Submitted: Your login request has been submitted. Please check your email for a link to activate and log in to your account.
Footer.Text.Slogan: Global community measuring internet censorship around the world.
